Sequence Information.Peptide Name: LM7 (Lactomodulin fragment, Synthetic AMPs, XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (47.06%) toEMP-ERI: 25%, V=L=A=P: 17%.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC 25923 or MRSA BAA 2313 (MIC 1.5-1.8 uM),  C. difficile ATCC 43602 (MIC 1.8 uM), L. monocytogenes ATCC 15313 (MIC 3.6 uM), E. faecium anti-VRE BAA 2317 (MIC 1.5 uM), E.coli ATCC 33694 (NA), P.aeruginosa BAA 1744 (NA), and S.enterica ATCC 13314 (NA). NA: not observed.
Literature Information.Author: Mousa WK, Shaikh AY, Ghemrawi R, Aldulaimi M, Al Ali A, Sammani N, Khair M, Helal MI, Al-Marzooq F, Oueis E. 2024
Literature Information.Title: Human microbiome derived synthetic antimicrobial peptides with activity against Gram-negative, Gram-positive, and antibiotic resistant bacteria.
